Title: normalizeUTF8NFD
Description: Converts a string to NFD normalized form, assuming the string is valid UTF8-encoded text.
String transformed to NFD normalization form. String.
Examples: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFD('â') AS nfd, length(nfd) AS nfd_len;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFD('â') AS nfd, length(nfd) AS nfd_len;
